Name: Hassan Ghaffari
Title: Director of Metallurgy, Senior Mineral Processing Engineer
About/Summary:
I was impressed with Kirsty’s leadership, enthusiasm, organization, confidence, communication skills, and professional during more than seven years working together at Tetra Tech Wardrop engineering . I was also impressed with her critical thinking in persuading mining and engineering  projects collaboratively with the top management team. Kirsty was initially Manage of Administration then promoted to Executive Assistant position. 

During the many years knowing and working with Kirsty collaboratively on many projects, she consistently demonstrated all of thesequalities and more, and I heartily endorse her for the Executive assistant position in large mining and engineering firms.
